attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aim of this petition is to show the government that the voters of Britain do not want our hard-earned cash thrown away by MPS. MPs get paid a hell of alot more than most families in Britain - yet they still waste our money on themselves, surely in this economic climate - this money (many hundreds of thousands of pounds), could be used to help secure the economy, keep people in jobs and stop the greediness that has seeped into our government.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
